name: ITK Family History Illness
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system which contains concepts related to family history of the subject of the record.  These are mainly pre-coordinated concepts relating to the medical history of the close family, which may include partners where it may impact the subject's health. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Family History' subset with subset original id 1331000000135; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Family history simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset id 999000771000000106.
